text: Ilmārs Verpakovskis (15 October 1958 – 6 February 2022Ilmārs Verpakovskis (1958 - 2022) ) was a Latvian footballer. He played as a midfielder. He made three appearances for the Latvia national team from 1991 until 1992. He was the father of footballer Māris Verpakovskis. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Latvian footballers Category:Sportspeople from Riga
title: Ilmārs Verpakovskis
